detectors.description: Timith.random() (contracts/Timith.sol#206-208) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(tx.origin,blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1),block.timestamp)) (contracts/Timith.sol#207)
